Registrarse
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormsModule } from '@angular/forms'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; // Agregado import { Login } from './login'; import { Loginresponse } from './loginresponse'; // Suscribiendose al servicio import { LoginService } from './login.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'] }) // implements OnInit export class LoginComponent{ email = "" password = "" errorMessage = "Datos Incorrectos" failedLogin = false loginresponse: Loginresponse //constructor(private router: Router) { } constructor(private LoginService: LoginService) { } //ngOnInit() { //} handleLogin() : void { this.LoginService.postLogin(this.email, this.password).subscribe(cs => {this.loginresponse = cs;}); // this.eventosService.getEventos('').subscribe(cs => {this.eventos = cs;}) if(this.loginresponse.mensaje === "usuario creado exitosamente") { // Redirect to Welcome Page //this.router.navigate(['eventos', this.email]) this.failedLogin = false this.errorMessage = "Exitoso" } else { this.failedLogin = true this.errorMessage = "Datos Incorrectos" } console.log(this.failedLogin) } } /* export class LoginComponent { email = "" password = "" errorMessage = "Datos Incorrectos" failedLogin = false constructor(private router: Router) {} handleLogin() : void { if(this.email === "hola" && this.password === "123") { // Redirect to Welcome Page this.router.navigate(['eventos', this.email]) this.failedLogin = false } else { this.failedLogin = true } console.log(this.failedLogin) } } */
